ValidationRule.description: An open Risk is preventing case file closure. Is_Risk_Open roll up summary counts risks without sign off
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Is_Risk_Open__c > 0, OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Discharged'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed Awaiting Admin') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An open Risk is preventing case file closure.
